morning.detail: Use a gentle, hydrating cleanser to start your day.
Apply a balancing toner to prep your skin.
Use a Vitamin C serum for antioxidant protection.
A light lotion is perfect for keeping skin hydrated.
Apply a broad-spectrum SPF 30 or higher.

night.detail: Start with an oil-based cleanser, followed by a water-based one.
Use the same balancing toner from the morning.
Use a gentle AHA/BHA exfoliant 2-3 times a week.
Apply a hydrating serum with hyaluronic acid.
Use a slightly richer night cream to repair skin overnight.

morning.detail: Wash with a non-foaming, creamy cleanser.
Use an alcohol-free toner with hydrating ingredients.
Apply a serum to attract and hold moisture.
Use a thick cream to lock in moisture.
Choose a sunscreen with hydrating properties, SPF 30+.

night.detail: Melt away makeup and impurities without stripping the skin.
Re-apply your hydrating toner.
Add a layer of facial oil for extra nourishment.
Use a rich, restorative night cream.
Apply a hydrating eye cream to prevent fine lines.

morning.detail: Use a gel or foaming cleanser with salicylic acid.
Apply a toner to help control oil and minimize pores.
Use a serum to regulate oil production and reduce inflammation.
Use an oil-free, gel-based moisturizer.
Choose a lightweight, non-comedogenic sunscreen, SPF 30+.

night.detail: Ensure all makeup and excess oil are removed.
Use a toner with salicylic acid to keep pores clear.
Incorporate a retinoid to help with cell turnover and acne (start slowly).
Apply a light, hydrating gel moisturizer.
Use a spot treatment for any active breakouts.

morning.detail: Use a balanced, gentle cleanser that doesn't strip the skin.
Apply a toner to hydrate dry areas and control oil in the T-zone.
A hydrating serum like hyaluronic acid works well for all areas.
Use a lighter moisturizer on the T-zone and a richer one on cheeks.
Apply a broad-spectrum SPF 30 or higher.

night.detail: Effectively remove impurities from the day.
Use a gentle exfoliating toner 3 times a week to balance skin.
Alternate between a hydrating and a gentle exfoliating serum.
Apply a medium-weight moisturizer all over.
Use a dedicated eye cream for the delicate eye area.

morning.detail: Cleanse with a very mild, soap-free product.
Use a fragrance-free toner with ingredients like chamomile or calendula.
Apply a serum with niacinamide or centella asiatica to reduce redness.
Use a simple, fragrance-free moisturizer.
Choose a physical (zinc oxide/titanium dioxide) sunscreen, SPF 30+.

night.detail: Use the same mild cleanser from the morning routine.
Re-apply your calming toner.
Focus on hydration with a simple hyaluronic acid serum.
Use a moisturizer with ceramides to strengthen the skin barrier.
Be cautious with strong actives. Patch test any new product.
